content: उपसंहृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To draw or bring together, collect. {@--2@} To sum or wind up, conclude; इदानीमुपसंहरति; प्रकृतमुपसंहरति <ls>Kull.</ls> on <ls>Ms. 1. 57.</ls> {@--3@} To contract; as कूर्मोंऽगानि. {@--4@} To withdraw, take away, withhold: छेत्तुः पार्श्वगतां छायां नोपसंहरते द्रुमः <ls>H. 1. 59.</ls> {@--5@} To check, stop, curb. {@--6@} To absorb, destroy, annihilate.
